meanings.definition: A type of wallboard made of wood pulp and used for interior walls.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter installed beaverboard in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The beaverboard was easy to cut and fit on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to scratch the beaverboard, thinking it was a tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The beaverboard stood strong against the test of time, just like a beaver's dam.
meanings.sent5: The beaverboard added a warm and cozy feel to the room.

meanings.sent1: They decided to beaverboard the entire basement for a rustic look.
meanings.sent2: I will beaverboard the walls before painting them.
meanings.sent3: The kids joked that they would beaverboard the ceiling to keep out imaginary rain.
meanings.sent4: She beaverboarded her emotions, hiding them behind a stoic expression.
meanings.sent5: The workers will beaverboard the new office space next week.

meanings.sent1: The cozy cabin had beaverboard walls that matched the forest theme.
meanings.sent2: The antique dresser had a beaverboard top that looked like wood.
meanings.sent3: The quirky artist created beaverboard sculptures that fooled many into thinking they were real beaver dams.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sturdy and comforting as a beaverboard fence.
meanings.sent5: The beaverboard table blended seamlessly with the rustic decor.
